file_content.text: I will show your healers the darkness they hide in their hearts.
You liked that. I feel the darkness in you, the joy you felt at my apprentices' deaths.
Will you kill me as well? Or does your hatred demand more?
Would you rather see me scream? Draw it out for days while I beg you to end it?
Return, and you can be the man you once were.
Even you can be healed.
Fine. Make your empty gestures. Save my life.
Inviting me into the Republic is like bringing poison into your flesh.
Sooner or later, it will kill you.
We'll take him from here. There's a Jedi healer arriving on the next starship.
Never take your eyes off him. He's still a danger.
Be careful with him.
No one can be vigilant forever--and when they let down their guard, all will learn the magnitude of your failure.
It will be a difficult job. I wish her luck.
I hope she can reach him.
To heal someone, you must open your heart to them. She will let me in, and I will consume her.
Glad to see the last of him.
Great. Take him.
You will see me every day when you look in the mirror.
All right, boys. Gag him and drag him. Let's get out of here.
I hope it's painful enough for your tastes.
You die now.
Just as I would have said.
We'll secure the rest of the facility. Good job in there.
The Republic's lucky to have you.
Where were you guys when I needed you?
Now you show up?
Oh, it sounded like you had it all under control.
Believe me, there's nothing left in there with a heartbeat.
There's nothing left alive.
All the better, my friends.
All the better, my friend.
Onward and upward, boys. Let's see what kind of records these morons kept.
Not a problem.
